attributes.action: Stop The Lisburn Council From Removing My Sons Headstone
attributes.additional_details: I have contacted my solicitor they said theres nothing they can do they advised me to get as much people to sign this petition and take it too the newspaper please everyone im begging you to sign this
attributes.background: The Lisburn City Council wants to remove my sons headstone after nearly 6 years, They want to put grass on it and take the headstone, the floor and the surround off as they think its to big but its our belief as traveller people to have big headstones for our Dead,

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the Lisburn and Castlereagh City Council, and the UK Government and Parliament can't change the council's decision. 

You can find out how to contact local councillors here:

https://www.lisburncastlereagh.gov.uk/council/elected-members

If you believe you've been discriminated against, the Equality Commission for Northern Ireland may be able to give you advice. You can find out more here:

http://www.equalityni.org/Individuals
